channel.title: Rana Daggubati on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Rana Daggubati on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Sundance Winner ‘Cactus Pears’ Sets Indian Theatrical Release via ‘Baahubali’ Star Rana Daggubati’s Spirit Media (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Rohan Parashuram Kanwade’s “Cactus Pears” (Sabar Bonda) is heading home to India after making history earlier this year as the first Indian fiction feature to win the Grand Jury Priz
